CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We report the synthesis , characterization , and solar cell properties of new donor - acceptor - type low band gap polymers ( POBDTPD and PEBDTPD ) that incorporate dialkoxybenzodithiophene ( BDT ) as the donor and N-octyl-2,7-dithia-5-azacyclopenta[a]pentalene-4,6-dione ( DTPD ) as the acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| POBDTPD |
| PEBDTPD |
| dialkoxybenzodithiophene (BDT) |
| N-octyl-2,7-dithia-5-azacyclopenta[a]pentalene-4,6-dione (DTPD) |

I have reviewed the paragraph and the entities listed above are the ones that can be considered as "Material Name".
